campaignTrail_temp.running_mate_image_url = 'https://i.imgur.com/yJcXPOA.png';

const targetNode = document.getElementById("game_window");
const config = { attributes: true, childList: true, subtree: true };

function onGameWindowChanged(mutationList, observer) {
    updateQuestionBanner();
}

function updateQuestions(mutationList, observer) {
    if (answerObject.fields.condition != null) {
        answer.disabled = !(eval(answerObject.fields.condition));
    }
}

const observer = new MutationObserver(onGameWindowChanged);
	observer.observe(targetNode, config);

e.VPisCandidate = 0;
function updateQuestionBanner() {
    let questionBanner = document.getElementById("campaign_sign");
    if (!questionBanner || questionBanner.nodeName != "DIV") return;
    let img = document.createElement('img');
    if(e.VPisCandidate == 0)
    {
        img.src = 'https://i.imgur.com/NNkFBiH.png';
        img.width = 280; // Adjust the width as needed
        img.height = 105; // Adjust the height as needed
    }
   
   { 
    if (e.VPisCandidate == 1)
        img.src = 'https://i.imgur.com/KuFHQ0h.png';
        img.width = 280; // Adjust the width as needed
        img.height = 105; // Adjust the height as needed    
    questionBanner.replaceWith(img);
   }

   { 
    if (e.VPisCandidate == 2)
        img.src = 'https://i.imgur.com/tskgfc2.png';
        img.width = 280; // Adjust the width as needed
        img.height = 105; // Adjust the height as needed    
    questionBanner.replaceWith(img);
   }
    if (e.VPisCandidate == 3)
        img.src = 'https://i.imgur.com/e59MT3P.png';
        img.width = 280; // Adjust the width as needed
        img.height = 105; // Adjust the height as needed    
    questionBanner.replaceWith(img);    
}

function tunnel(new_q){
    return e.questions_json[e.questions_json.map(f=>f.pk).indexOf(new_q)];
}

// Opps
function switcheroo20() {
    var id = e.candidate_json.map(p=>p.pk).indexOf(78)
    e.candidate_json[id].fields.first_name = ""
    e.candidate_json[id].fields.last_name = "Homer"
    e.candidate_json[id].fields.color_hex = "#FFD800" 
}

function switcheroo90() {
    var id = e.candidate_json.map(p=>p.pk).indexOf(77)
    e.candidate_json[id].fields.first_name = ""
    e.candidate_json[id].fields.last_name = "Thiag"
    e.candidate_json[id].fields.color_hex = "#5900C6"     
}
function switcheroo91() {
    var id = e.candidate_json.map(p=>p.pk).indexOf(77)
    e.candidate_json[id].fields.first_name = ""
    e.candidate_json[id].fields.last_name = "Gart F. Jonkler"
    e.candidate_json[id].fields.color_hex = "#7669F4"     
}

    e.candidate_json[id].fields.last_name = "Lawberg"

function NoLARPshift() {
    var id = campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json.map(p => p.pk).indexOf(268);
    campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json[id].fields.issue_score = 0;
    var id = campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json.map(p => p.pk).indexOf(269);
    campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json[id].fields.issue_score = 0;

    campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json[id].fields.issue_score = 0;
    var id = campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json.map(p => p.pk).indexOf(271);
    campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json[id].fields.issue_score = 0;
    var id = campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json.map(p => p.pk).indexOf(272);
    campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json[id].fields.issue_score = 0;
    //Alabama

    campaignTrail_temp.candidate_state_multiplier_json[id].fields.state_multiplier = 0.0;

function Gartshift() {
    var id = campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json.map(p => p.pk).indexOf(258);
    campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json[id].fields.issue_score = -0.4;
    var id = campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json.map(p => p.pk).indexOf(259);
    campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json[id].fields.issue_score = -0.45;
    var id = campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json.map(p => p.pk).indexOf(260);
    campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json[id].fields.issue_score = -0.00485;
    var id = campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json.map(p => p.pk).indexOf(261);
    campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json[id].fields.issue_score = 0;
    var id = campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json.map(p => p.pk).indexOf(262);
    campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json[id].fields.issue_score = -0.4;
    //Alabama
    var id = campaignTrail_temp.candidate_state_multiplier_json.map(p => p.pk).indexOf(676);
    campaignTrail_temp.candidate_state_multiplier_json[id].fields.state_multiplier = 1;
    //Alaska
    var id = campaignTrail_temp.candidate_state_multiplier_json.map(p => p.pk).indexOf(677);

function Lawbergshift() {

    campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json[id].fields.issue_score = -0.65;
    var id = campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json.map(p => p.pk).indexOf(260);
    campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json[id].fields.issue_score = 0;

cyoAdventure = function(a) {
    e.noCounter += 1
ans = campaignTrail_temp.player_answers[campaignTrail_temp.player_answers.length - 1];


//Q1
    if(ans == 12361 ){
        LARP -= 1;
    console.log("I didn't steal it");
    }

    if(ans == 12363 ){
        Trans += 1;
    console.log("I didn't steal it");
    }

    if(ans == 12365 ){
        Trans += 2;
    console.log("I didn't steal it");
    }

    if(ans == 12367 ){
        LARP += 1;
    console.log("I didn't steal it");
    }

//Q2

    if(ans == 12370 ){
        LM += 1;
        LMuser = "MinuteMan";
    console.log("New Larpmaster");
    }

    if(ans == 12372 ){
        LM += 2;
        LMuser = "Poopyfart";
    console.log("New Larpmaster");
    }

    if(ans == 12372 ){
        Trans += 1;
    console.log("I didn't steal it");
    }

    if(ans == 12374 ){
        LARP += 2;
    console.log("More LARP");
    }

//Q3  

if (e.noCounter == 2) {        
        if (Trans >= 2) {

            {
                if (index !== -1) {
                    menuItemsA.splice(index, 1);
                }
            }
            index = menuItemsA.findIndex(item => item.id === 'NID_F');
           {
                if (index !== -1) {
                    menuItemsA.splice(index, 1);
                }
            }
            index = menuItemsA.findIndex(item => item.id === 'RDS_F');
            if(Opp != 5){
                if (index !== -1) {
                    menuItemsA.splice(index, 1);
                }
            }
            index = menuItemsA.findIndex(item => item.id === 'RAYA_F');
{
                if (index !== -1) {
                    menuItemsA.splice(index, 1);
                }
            }
            index = menuItemsA.findIndex(item => item.id === 'PBD_F');
{
                if (index !== -1) {
                    menuItemsA.splice(index, 1);
                }
            }
 }
    if(e.noCounter == 10 && LARPer == 9){
            menuItemsA.push(MackCand)
  }
  if(e.noCounter == 9 && Gonk == 1){
            menuItemsA.push(PopeKronkCand)
  }
  if(e.noCounter == 9 && Gonk == 8){
            menuItemsA.push(BarkCand)
  }
  if(e.noCounter == 9 && Gonk == 2){
            menuItemsA.push(SomeoneCand)
  }
  if(e.noCounter == 9 && Gonk == 3){
            menuItemsA.push(DysonCand)
  }
  if(e.noCounter == 9 && Gonk == 4){
            menuItemsA.push(FrankoCand)
  }
  if(e.noCounter == 9 && Gonk == 5){
            menuItemsA.push(RomeCand)
  }
  if(e.noCounter == 9 && Gonk == 6){
            menuItemsA.push(GonkCand)
  }
  if(e.noCounter == 9 && Gonk == 7){
            menuItemsA.push(KronkCand)
  }
 if(e.noCounter == 10) {
            let index = menuItemsA.findIndex(item => item.id === 'KRONK_B');
            if(KronkDeath == 1){
                if (index !== -1) {
                    menuItemsA.splice(index, 1, DeadKronkCand );
                }
            }
 }
 if(e.noCounter == 11) {
            let index = menuItemsA.findIndex(item => item.id === 'MEOW_B');
            if(MeowDeath == 1){
                if (index !== -1) {
                    menuItemsA.splice(index, 1, DeadMeowCand );
                }
            }
 }
 if(e.noCounter == 12) {
                index = menuItemsA.findIndex(item => item.id === 'RDS_F');
{
                if (index !== -1) {
                    menuItemsA.splice(index, 1);
                }
            }
 }
 if(e.noCounter == 13) {
            let index = menuItemsA.findIndex(item => item.id === 'HOMER_A');
            if(DOH <= 2 || VP <= 0){
                if (index !== -1) {
                    menuItemsA.splice(index, 1, HamsCand );
                }
            }
 }
 if(e.noCounter == 13) {
            let index = menuItemsA.findIndex(item => item.id === 'HOMER_A');
            if(DOH >= 3 || VP >= 1){
                if (index !== -1) {
                    menuItemsA.splice(index, 1, HomerCand );
                }
            }
 }
 if(e.noCounter == 15) {
            let index = menuItemsA.findIndex(item => item.id === 'KOSTAS_A');
            if(Opp == 2 && MAGA == 3 && Trans <= 0 && Thiag <= 0){
                if (index !== -1) {
                    menuItemsA.splice(index, 1, KostasCand );
                }
            }
 }
        refreshSurrogates()     
}

function onGameWindowChangeCandidates() {
    const resultsTableHolder = document.getElementById("overall_details_container");

    if (!resultsTableHolder || resultsTableHolder.classList.contains("done")) {
        return;
    }

    resultsTableHolder.classList.add("done");

    const resultsTable = resultsTableHolder.childNodes[3].childNodes[3].children[0];

    for (let i = 0; i < resultsTable.children.length; i++) {
        const row = resultsTable.children[i];
        let name = row.firstChild.innerText;
        row.insertCell(1);
        if (name) {
            name = name.replaceAll("-", "").trim();
        }

        if (i == 0) {
            row.children[1].innerHTML = `<span style="font-weight:bold">Running Mate</span>`;
        } else {
            row.children[1].innerHTML = vpTable[name];
        }
    }

    const resultsTableHistorical = resultsTableHolder.childNodes[5].childNodes[3].children[0];

    for (let i = 0; i < resultsTableHistorical.children.length; i++) {
        const row = resultsTableHistorical.children[i];
        let name = row.childNodes[1].innerText;
        row.insertCell(1);
        if (name) {
            name = name.replaceAll("-", "").trim();
        }

        if (i == 0) {
            row.children[1].innerHTML = `<span style="font-weight:bold">Running Mate</span>`;
        } else {
            row.children[1].innerHTML = vpTableHistorical[name];
        }
    }

    // Add CSS to increase row spacing
    const styleElem = document.createElement('style');
    styleElem.textContent = `
        #overall_details_container table tr {
            line-height: 1.5; /* Adjust line height as needed */
        }
    `;
    document.head.appendChild(styleElem);
}

function updateHistoricalData(newVpTable, newHexColors, newNames, newEvs, newPvs, newPvps) {
    vpTableHistorical = newVpTable;
    HistHexcolour = newHexColors;
    HistName = newNames;
    HistEV = newEvs;
    HistPV = newPvs;
    HistPVP = newPvps;
}
// constructs endings based on header and pages
construct = (a = 1) => {
    e.page = e.page + a < e.pages.length ? e.page + a : 0;
    let html = e.header;
    html += e.pages[e.page] + "<br>";

    // Buttons (centered)
    html += `<div style="text-align: center; margin-top: 1rem;">`;
    if (e.page > 0) {
        html += `<button onclick='endingConstructor(a = -1)' style="margin: 0 10px;">Back</button>`;
    }
    if (e.page < e.pages.length - 1) {
        html += `<button onclick='endingConstructor(a = 1)' style="margin: 0 10px;">Next</button>`;
    }
    html += `</div>`;


    // Run page executables
    for (let i in e.executable) {
        if (e.executable[i][0] == e.page) {
            e.executable[i][1]();
        }
    }

    // Image logic
    if (e.image === true) {
        setTimeout(() => {
            const candImg = $(".person_image")[0];
            if (candImg) {
                candImg.remove();
                $("#final_results_description")[0].style = `
                    text-align:left;
                    width: 72%;
                    /* height: 101%; */
                    text-overflow: ellipsis;
                    display: block;
                    margin-left: auto;
                    /*margin-right: auto;*/
                    color: white;
                `;
            }
        }, 10);
    } else if (e.image) {
        setTimeout(() => {
            const candImg = $(".person_image")[0];
            if (candImg) {
                candImg.src = e.image;
                $("#final_results_description")[0].style = `
                    text-align:left;
                    width: 72%;
                    /* height: 101%; */
                    text-overflow: ellipsis;
                    display: block;
                    margin-left: auto;
                    /*margin-right: auto;*/
                    color: white;
                `;
            }
        }, 10);
    }

    // Scroll to top
    const resultsDescriptionElement = document.getElementById('results_container');
    if (resultsDescriptionElement) {
        resultsDescriptionElement.scrollTop = 0;
    }

    return html;
}

  // constructs endings based on header and pages

  construct = (a = 1) => {
    
    e.page = e.page + a < e.pages.length ? e.page + a : 0
    let html = e.header;
    html += e.pages[e.page] + "<br>";
    if (e.page > 0) {
    
    html += `<button onclick='endingConstructor(a = -1)'>Back</button>`
    }
    if (e.page < e.pages.length - 1) {
    
    html += `<button onclick='endingConstructor(a = 1)'>Next</button>`
    }
    
    for (i in e.executable) {
    if (e.executable[i][0] == e.page) {
        e.executable[i][1]();
      
    }
    }
    
    if (e.image == true)
    setTimeout(()=>{
      candImg = $(".person_image")[0]
      if (candImg) {
        candImg.remove()
      console.log("TRYING");
        $("#final_results_description")[0].style = `
          text-align:left;
          width: 72%;
        height:71%;
          display: block;
          margin-left: auto;
          margin-right: auto;
        overflow: auto;
        `
       console.log("RESULTS UPDATED");
      }
    }, 10)
    else if (e.image)
    setTimeout(()=>{
      candImg = $(".person_image")[0];
      if (candImg) {
        candImg.src = e.image;
      console.log("TRYING");
        $("#final_results_description")[0].style = `
          text-align:left;
          width: 72%;
        height:71%;
          display: block;
          margin-left: auto;
          margin-right: auto;
        overflow: auto;
        `
       console.log("RESULTS UPDATED");
      }        
    }, 10)
    
    return html;
}

  endingConstructor = (a = 1) => {
    $("#final_results_description")[0].innerHTML = construct(a);
  }

    function calculateCandidateElectoralVotes(finalResults) {
        // Variables to hold electoral vote counts for each candidate
        let ThiagEV = 0;
        let OppEV = 0;
        let LARPEV = 0;
        let GonkEV = 0;


        // Loop through each state result to sum up electoral votes by candidate
        finalResults.forEach(stateResult => {
            stateResult.result.forEach(candidateResult => {
                const candidateId = candidateResult.candidate; // Candidate's unique identifier
                const electoralVotes = candidateResult.electoral_votes; // Electoral votes for this candidate in this state

                // Assign electoral votes to the appropriate candidate's total
                switch (candidateId) {
                    case 77: // Replace 23 with Johnson's actual candidate ID
                        ThiagEV += electoralVotes;
                        break;
                    case 78: // Replace 24 with Nixon's actual candidate ID
                        OppEV += electoralVotes;
                        break;
                    case 79: // Replace 25 with Wallace's actual candidate ID
                        LARPEV += electoralVotes;
                        break;
                    case 12704: // Any other candidate ID will be counted as Fourth Party
                        GonkEV += electoralVotes;
                        break;
                }
            });
        });

        // Return an object containing the results for each candidate
        return {
            ThiagEV,
            OppEV,
            LARPEV,
            GonkEV,
        };
    }


  // ENDINGS -- this is slightly more reliable than the ending code method

  e.multiple_endings = true;

  e.header = "<h1>Error-Handling Message (oops)</h1>";
  e.pages = ["<p>This is an error handler</p>", "<p>I dun goof</p>", "<p>Contact me on Discord (DecstarG#4326) or Reddit (u/DecstarG) and we'll see if I can fix up your problem.</p>", "<p>Sorry!</p>"];
  e.page = 0;

You type "Hi!" Which proceeds to get instantly flooded by an argument over whether or not Bernie would have won in 2016. He is talking about how Gonkefeller must fall and he has Lawberg, Cheese, and the likes nodding in agreement. You find yourself typing... <b>"We will win!!</b> But then suddenly, just a few seconds after your victory chant, your heart drops @everyone Libra pings, and then they drop the result. <b>YOU WON!!!</b> A bit anti-climatic? Possibly. But you sure as hell won and no one is going to take that away from you.</p><p>Instantly a reign of congratulations comes falling down the skye and onto #pief-general you get pings from everyone, the oldheads, the newgens, even deattached people you just saw argue in #general find themselves congratulating you. This is not like the times Oklahoman won, this is not like when you won the first time, <b>this is different</b>. The people have chosen you as their leader, not Gonkefeller or whoever else, <b>but you</b>.</p>

This is not just the good ‘ol boys, this is a widestretching coalition, one ready to take <b>our Deep State</b> back.</p> <p>After a few hours of banter, you and some of your apprentice return to #pief-general, where you find that the Orwell slopfest continues. Rocky, Libra, hell even Bobby all come out in support of you on election night. <b>This is a movement</b>, one that Deep State has never seen before, and one that shall grant you re-election.</p> <h><p>the rizzler</h></p> <h><p>skibidi toilet</h></p> <h><p>trump AI</h></p> <b><h><p>IT NEVER ENDS</b></h></p><p>You escape #pief-general, most of your allies with you. function openSurrogates() {
    let questions = document.querySelector(".inner_window_question");

    // Check if the menu already exists
    let popOutMenu = document.getElementById('popOutMenu');
    if (!popOutMenu) {
        popOutMenu = document.createElement('div');
        popOutMenu.id = 'popOutMenu';
        popOutMenu.style.position = 'absolute'; // Change to absolute for relative positioning
        popOutMenu.style.width = '464px';
        popOutMenu.style.height = '514px';
        popOutMenu.style.backgroundColor = '#fff';
        popOutMenu.style.boxShadow = '0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)';
        popOutMenu.style.zIndex = '1000';
        popOutMenu.style.backgroundImage = 'url("https://i.imgur.com/MXLqcCw.png")';
        popOutMenu.style.backgroundSize = 'cover';
        popOutMenu.style.backgroundPosition = 'center';
        popOutMenu.style.alignItems = 'center';     

        const qpic = document.createElement('img');
        if(e.noCounter == 18){
            qpic.src = "https://i.imgur.com/9YJRBAm.png";
        }
        else{
            qpic.src = pictureDict[e.noCounter];
        }
        qpic.src = pictureDict[e.noCounter];
        qpic.style.width = '135px';
        qpic.style.height = '152px';
        qpic.style.position = "absolute";
        qpic.style.top = "116px";  
        qpic.style.left = "288px"; 
        popOutMenu.appendChild(qpic);

        //<b><span style="color: #D9321E;">
          var overviewtxt  = ""

        TransText = `${TransMap[String(Trans)]}`;
        LARPText = `${LARPMap[String(LARP)]}`;
        LMText = `${LMMap[String(LM)]}`;
        HSText = `${HSMap[String(HS)]}`;
        PopeText = `${PopeMap[String(Pope)]}`;
        overviewtxt += "• "+ `${TransText}` + "<br>";
        overviewtxt += "• "+ `${LARPText}` + "<br>";
        overviewtxt += "• "+ `${LMText}` + "<br>";
        overviewtxt += "• "+ `${HSText}` + "<br>";
        overviewtxt += "• "+ `${PopeText}` + "<br>";

        const ovsubtxt = document.createElement('p');
        ovsubtxt.innerHTML = overviewtxt;
        ovsubtxt.style.textAlign = 'left';
        ovsubtxt.style.position = "absolute";
        ovsubtxt.style.lineHeight = '1.3';
        ovsubtxt.style.top = "116px";  
        ovsubtxt.style.left = "13px"; 
        popOutMenu.appendChild(ovsubtxt);
        


        const menuListA = document.createElement('ul');
        menuListA.style.listStyle = 'none';
        menuListA.style.position = "absolute";
        menuListA.style.top = "295px";  
        menuListA.style.right = "12px"; 
        menuListA.style.padding = '0';
        menuListA.style.maxHeight = '199px'; 
        menuListA.style.overflowY = 'auto'; 

        // Add menu items from the array
        menuItemsA.forEach(item => {
            const menuItem = document.createElement('div');
            menuItem.style.display = 'flex';
            menuItem.style.alignItems = 'flex-start';
            menuItem.style.marginBottom = '1px';
            menuItem.style.width = '420px';
            menuItem.style.height = '90px';


            const photo = document.createElement('img');
            photo.src = item.photo;
            photo.style.border = "1px solid #000000"; 
            photo.style.padding = "1px"; 
            photo.style.width = '85px';
            photo.style.height = '85px';
            photo.style.marginRight = '10px';

            const textAndButton = document.createElement('div');

            const name = document.createElement('p');
            name.style.fontSize = "15px"; 
            name.style.color = "#DEEFDD"; 
            name.innerHTML = item.name; 
            name.style.fontFamily = "Arial, sans-serif"; 
            name.style.textRendering = "optimizeSpeed"; 
            name.style.webkitFontSmoothing = "none"; 
            name.style.mozOsxFontSmoothing = "none"; 
            name.style.fontWeight = "450"; 
            name.style.position = "absolute";  
            name.style.marginLeft = "4px";    
            name.style.marginTop = "5px";    
            textAndButton.appendChild(name);

            const text = document.createElement('p');
            text.style.fontSize = "12px";
            text.style.color = "#DEEFDD" 
            text.innerHTML = item.text; 
            text.style.fontFamily = "Arial, sans-serif"; 
            text.style.textRendering = "optimizeSpeed"; 
            text.style.webkitFontSmoothing = "none"; 
            text.style.mozOsxFontSmoothing = "none"; 
            text.style.fontWeight = "450"; 
            text.style.position = "absolute"; 
            text.style.marginLeft = "-7px";    
            text.style.marginTop = "29px";    

            textAndButton.appendChild(text);
            menuItem.appendChild(photo);
            menuItem.appendChild(textAndButton);

            menuListA.appendChild(menuItem);
        });
        popOutMenu.appendChild(menuListA);

        const closeButton = document.createElement('button');
        closeButton.id = "closeButton"; 
        const closeIcon = document.createElement('img');
        closeIcon.id = "closeIcon"; 

        closeIcon.src = "https://i.imgur.com/cThipKS.png";
        closeIcon.alt = "Close";

        closeButton.style.position = "absolute";
        closeButton.style.top = "-6px";  
        closeButton.style.right = "-57px";

        closeButton.appendChild(closeIcon);
        closeButton.onclick = closeSurrogates;
        popOutMenu.appendChild(closeButton);

        document.body.appendChild(popOutMenu);

        makeDraggable(popOutMenu);
    } 

    if (savedX !== null && savedY !== null) {
        popOutMenu.style.left = savedX + 'px';
        popOutMenu.style.top = savedY + 'px';
    }
    else {
        const buttonRect = event.target.getBoundingClientRect();
        popOutMenu.style.left = buttonRect.right + 353 + 'px'; 
        popOutMenu.style.top = buttonRect.top - 292 + 'px'; 
        savedX = popOutMenu.getBoundingClientRect().left;
        savedY = popOutMenu.getBoundingClientRect().top;
    }

    // Display the menu
    popOutMenu.style.display = 'block';
}

function closeSurrogates() {
    const popOutMenu = document.getElementById('popOutMenu');
    if (popOutMenu) {
        savedX = popOutMenu.getBoundingClientRect().left;
        savedY = popOutMenu.getBoundingClientRect().top;

        popOutMenu.remove();
    }
}

function refreshSurrogates() {
    const popOutMenu = document.getElementById('popOutMenu');
    if (popOutMenu) {
        popOutMenu.remove();
        openSurrogates();
    }
}

function makeDraggable(element) {
    let isDragging = false;
    let offsetX, offsetY;

    element.onmousedown = function(event) {
        isDragging = true;
        offsetX = event.clientX - element.getBoundingClientRect().left;
        offsetY = event.clientY - element.getBoundingClientRect().top;

        document.onmousemove = function(event) {
            if (isDragging) {
                const newX = event.clientX - offsetX;
                const newY = event.clientY - offsetY;

                // Update the position of the element
                element.style.left = newX + 'px';
                element.style.top = newY + 'px';

                // Save the position in global variables
                savedX = newX;
                savedY = newY;
            }
        };

        document.onmouseup = function() {
            isDragging = false;
            document.onmousemove = null;
            document.onmouseup = null;
        };
    };
}

e.initDC = false

function addHeadquarterButton() {
    // Check if the button already exists
    if (document.getElementById('headquarter_button')) {
        return;
    }

    // Find the reference button by its ID
    const refButton = document.getElementById('view_electoral_map');
    if (!refButton) {
        return;
    }

    // Create a new button element
    const newButton = document.createElement('button');

    newButton.id = 'headquarter_button';

    newButton.style.marginLeft = '1.5em';

    newButton.innerHTML = 'Cameras';

    // Attach the click event listener
    newButton.addEventListener('click', openSurrogates);

    // Insert the new button next to the reference button
    refButton.insertAdjacentElement('afterend', newButton);
}

async function handleFooter() {
    var gameWindow = document.getElementById('game_window');
    addHeadquarterButton()
};

async function handleMutations(mutationsList, observer) {
    if (observerRunning) return;
    observerRunning = true;
    observer.disconnect();
    await handleFooter();
    observer.observe(document.documentElement, { childList: true, subtree: true });
    observerRunning = false;
}
let processedNodes = new Set();
let observerRunning = false;

var element = document.getElementById('controlElement');
if (!element) {
	let singleObserver = new MutationObserver(handleMutations);
	singleObserver.observe(document.documentElement, { childList: true, subtree: true });
	var controlElement = document.createElement('div');
	controlElement.style.display = 'none';
	controlElement.id = 'controlElement';
	document.body.appendChild(controlElement);
}

const gameWindowNode = document.getElementById("game_window");
const candidateWatcherConfig = { attributes: true, childList: true, subtree: true };

const candidateObserver = new MutationObserver(onGameWindowChangeCandidates);
candidateObserver.observe(gameWindowNode, candidateWatcherConfig);
const electionObserver = new MutationObserver((mutations, electionObserverInstance) => {
    for (let mutation of mutations) {
        if (mutation.type === "childList") {
            const electionElement = document.getElementById("election_night_buttons");
            if (electionElement) {
                const electionPlaylist = new Playlist();
                const electionSong = new Song(
                    "Femen",
                    "Crystal Castles",
                    "https://i1.sndcdn.com/artworks-000213207991-wxouhs-t500x500.jpg",
                     "https://audio.jukehost.co.uk/E5exfBkEuoSGhTmPnotXhFlYgmr3OZgv"
                );
                electionPlaylist.addSong(electionSong);
                changePlaylist(electionPlaylist);
                electionObserverInstance.disconnect(); 
                break;
            }
        }
    }
});


electionObserver.observe(document.body, { childList: true, subtree: true });
